Setting.Name: FAQ::Agent::StateTypes
Setting.Description: List of state types which can be used in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Customer::StateTypes
Setting.Description: List of state types which can be used in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Public::StateTypes
Setting.Description: List of state types which can be used in the public interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryName
Setting.Description: Default category name.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryComment
Setting.Description: Default category name.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Rates
Setting.Description: Rates for voting. Key must be in percent.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Show
Setting.Description: Show voting in defined interfaces.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Path::Show
Setting.Description: Show FAQ path yes/no.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultDecimalPlaces
Setting.Description: Decimal places of the voting result.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultColors
Setting.Description: CSS color for the voting result.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::QuickSearch::Show
Setting.Description: Interfaces where the quick search should be shown.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Show
Setting.Description: Show last change items in defined interfaces.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::ShowSubCategoryItems
Setting.Description: Show items of subcategories.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Limit
Setting.Description: Number of shown items in last changes.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Show
Setting.Description: Show last created items in defined interfaces.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::ShowSubCategoryItems
Setting.Description: Show items of subcategories.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Limit
Setting.Description: Number of shown items in last created.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Show
Setting.Description: Show top 10 items in defined interfaces.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Limit
Setting.Description: Number of shown items in the top 10 feature.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::ShowSubCategoryItems
Setting.Description: Show items of subcategories.

Setting.Name: FAQ::FAQHook
Setting.Description: The identifier for a FAQ, e.g. FAQ#, KB#, MyFAQ#. The default is FAQ#.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TitleSize
Setting.Description: Default maximum size of the titles in a FAQ article to be shown.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Default::State
Setting.Description: Default state for FAQ entry.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalRequired
Setting.Description: New FAQ articles need approval before they get published.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalGroup
Setting.Description: Group for the approval of FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalQueue
Setting.Description: Queue for the approval of FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketSubject
Setting.Description: Ticket subject for approval of FAQ article.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketBody
Setting.Description: Ticket body for approval of FAQ article.

Value.Item:
Hi,
a new FAQ article needs your approval before it can be published.
FAQ# : <OTRS_FAQ_NUMBER> Title : <OTRS_FAQ_TITLE> Author : <OTRS_FAQ_AUTHOR> State : <OTRS_FAQ_STATE>
If you want to do this, click on this link:
<OTRS_CONFIG_HttpType>://<OTRS_CONFIG_FQDN>/<OTRS_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentFAQEdit;ItemID=<OTRS_FAQ_ITEMID>
Your OTRS Notification Master

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketPriority
Setting.Description: Default priority of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketDefaultState
Setting.Description: Default state of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketType
Setting.Description: Default type of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field1
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field2
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field3
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field4
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field5
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Item::Field6
Setting.Description: Definition of FAQ item free text field.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8301
Setting.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'Normal' link type.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8302
Setting.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8303
Setting.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'Normal' link type.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8304
Setting.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.

Setting.Description: Defines the default FAQ order in the FAQ Explorer result of the customer interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

Setting.Description: Maximum size of the titles in a FAQ article to be shown in the FAQ Explorer in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###FAQ
Setting.Description: Defines where the 'Insert FAQ' link will be displayed.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::OutputFilterTextAutoLink###FAQ
Setting.Description: A filter for HTML output to add links behind a defined string. The element Image allows two input kinds. First the name of an image (e.g. faq.png). In this case the OTRS image path will be used. The second possibility is to insert the link to the image.

Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a FAQ in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Frontend::MenuModule###050-Delete
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows to delete a FAQ in its zoom view in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###InsertMethod
Setting.Description: Defines the information to be inserted in a FAQ based Ticket. "Full FAQ" includes text, attachments and inline images.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###IncludeInternal
Setting.Description: Include internal fields on a FAQ based Ticket.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowFieldNames
Setting.Description: Include the name of each field in a FAQ based Ticket.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertTextButton
Setting.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Text" / "Insert Full FAQ" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertLinkButton
Setting.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Link" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall for public FAQ Articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertTextAndLinkButton
Setting.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Text & Link" / "Insert Full FAQ & Link" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall for public FAQ Articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###UpdateArticleSubject
Setting.Description: Define if the FAQ title should be concatenated to article subject.

Setting.Name: FAQ::MultiLanguage
Setting.Description: Enable multiple languages on FAQ module.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Default::Language
Setting.Description: Default language for FAQ articles on single language mode.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonCSS###200-FAQ
Setting.Description: List of CSS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###200-FAQ
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::CustomerTicketMessage###003-FAQ
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Voting
Setting.Description: Enable voting mechanism on FAQ module.

Setting.Name: FAQ::CacheTTL
Setting.Description: Cache Time To Leave for FAQ items.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0398-FAQ-LastChange
Setting.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Limit" defines the number of entries displayed by default. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0399-FAQ-LastCreate
Setting.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Limit" defines the number of entries displayed by default. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###FAQ
Setting.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###FAQ
Setting.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked FAQs widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only FAQ attributes and dynamic fields (DynamicField_NameX) are allowed for DefaultColumns.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Customer::RelatedArticles::Enabled
Setting.Description: Enable the related article feature for the customer frontend.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterPostFAQCustomerRelatedArticles
Setting.Description: Output filter to add Java-script to CustomerTicketMessage screen.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerFAQRelatedArticles
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: FAQ::KeywordArticeList::SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Limit for the search to build the keyword FAQ article list.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###QueuesEnabled
Setting.Description: List of queue names for which the related article feature is enabled.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###DefaultLanguages
Setting.Description: The default languages for the related FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###ShowLimit
Setting.Description: Output limit for the related FAQ articles.

Setting.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###VoteStarsVisible
Setting.Description: Show the stars for the articles with a rating equal or greater like the defined value (set value '0' to deactivate the output).
